index.t_a_placeholder: Enter message you want to post or leave it blank ...
index.postSuccess: Your post has been posted Successfully...
index.mailSent: Your Email Has been sent sucessfully.
index.mailFail: Sorry we are unable to send this Email please try again!

alert.err_download_app: Error while downloading file may be some files are missing
alert.err_dlt_app: You can't delete all app types at once
alert.unMatch:
Provided data didn't matched!
You have only 3 chance
Be carefull if data will wrong you will'nt able to access server.
alert.fileMissing: License or config or social JSON file is missing!
alert.dataUpdated: Your data has been updated sucessfully!
alert.fReplace: File has been replace SuccessFully with
alert.err_in_activate: Problem to activate some problem found ! Some files are missing !
alert.err_app_type: Error uploading file please check all 4 image,php and json file exists in zip file you provide

page.dt_all: Delete all file of current directory.

login.title: Admin Panel
login.li: Your username of that you enter while registering app.
login.li2: License key of this app that you enter while registering app.

homepage.title: Admin Panel
homepage.copyright_msg: Copyright Msg on bottom of image.
homepage.status_msg: Closed Msg shown while app is closed.

upload.title: Change App Background
upload.m_default: Select file to make default background.
upload.default_msg: Original file submitted with app will be make as default background.

appImages.title: App Images
appImages.r_msg: This image will replace with new image.

social.limit: HOW MUCH TIMES YOU WANT TO SHOW PopUp USER PER DAY.
social.out_click: HIDE PopUp WHILE CLICKED ON BLACK PART.
social.esc_click: HIDE PopUp WHILE "ESC" KEY PRESSED ON KEYBOARD.
social.t_w_i: YOUR TWITTER TIMELINE WIDGET ID YOU WILL GET THIS HERE https://twitter.com/settings/widgets/new YOU WILL GET ID WHEN YOU WILL GENERATE ID BY CLICKING CREATE WIDGET SEE DATA-WIDGET-ID IN GENERATED CODE AND ENTER CODE ONLY HERE.
social.g_i: THIS IS YOUR GOOGLE PLUS ID FOR PAGE/PERSON IT WILL BE LIKE THIS WHILE VISITING YOUR PROFILE IN GOOGLE PLUS PLUS.GOOGLE.COM/YOUR_GPLUS_CODE

hints.title: Hints

ol.ii: Enter you details or leave it as on default settings.
ol.iii: If you are still unable to run apps sucessfully then goto Help.

hints.a_id: Enter Your facebook application app id.
hints.a_secret: Enter Your facebook application app Secret.
hints.a_url: Enter Your facebook application app url i.e http://apps.facebook.com/myapp
hints.f_page: Enter Your facebook page URL i.e http://www.facebook.com/myapps
hints.p_msg: This message will be posted on users wall with photo. Leave it blank if you want nothing to be posted. You can leave it default,If you don't want to change.
hints.i_msg: This message will be sent to people to whom user will invite for your app. You can leave it default,If you don't want to change.
hints.p_title: Enter Your facebook application page title.
hints.l_msg: This message will be shown when photo is loading... You can leave it default,If you don't want to change.
hints.t_a_placeholder: This will be shown on text area where user will type message to post. You can leave it default,If you don't want to change.
hints.ad_script:
Advertisment Script tag,this will be included in head of the app.
You will get this from you advertiser website.
hints.ad_slot: This is ads slot code which will be displayed down of photos Ads slot must be under 720px X 90px.
hints.ad_slot2: This is ads slot code which will be displayed down of photos, Ads slot must be under 300px X 300px.
hints.ad_slot3: This is ads slot code which will be displayed down of photos, Ads slot must be under 400px X 90px.
hints.fn_name: This font style will be used for text used in images. You can leave it default,If you don't want to change.
hints.fn_size: Font size of text that will be used in images. You can leave it default,If you don't want to change.

license.title: License Setting
license.msg: Here you can change details of your license like license key,username,date code.
license.warning: Be sure you have enter correct details else your app willn't work

app.title: App Settings
app.msg: You can edit details of you app like appId,appSecret,Facebook Page,adveritse Script and all other details related to app.
app.warning: Be sure you have enter correct details else your app willn't work.

social.title: Social popup Settings
social.msg: Here you have to enter some details about your social networks like twitter,facebook and google username which will be shown while running app.
social.warning: Be sure you have enter correct details else your app willn't work.

profile.title: Profile images
profile.msg: This photos are the profile picture of user who used your app.This photos are downloaded and kept in your server.If you want then you can delete this photos.
profile.warning: All the profile photos that are downloaded will deleted.

generated.title: Generated images
generated.msg: This photos are final images which is generated from app and stored in folder.
generated.warning: All the generated photos that are downloaded will deleted.

upload.title: Upload images
upload.msg: If you have edited the main background images of generated image then you can upload it from here,After uploading this images your older background images will be replaced with new one.Be sure width and height of images are 960 x 720px
upload.warning: Previous background image will be saved as backup.Click on default button to apply old background image.

appImages.title: App images
appImages.msg: If you want to change any image that are used in this app then you can upload and replace photo with previous one.
appImages.warning: While replacing new images with old images, your old images will be deleted from server.

deleteTmp.title: Delete Tmp
deleteTmp.msg: Temporary files that has been created while downloading files will be deleted from your server.
deleteTmp.warning: This files will not affect any other program
